com.fy.baselibrary.rv.adapter

类 RvCommonAdapter<Item>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ViewHolder>
      • com.fy.baselibrary.rv.adapter.RvCommonAdapter<Item>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.widget.Filterable
    直接已知子类:
    MultiCommonAdapter

    public abstract class RvCommonAdapter<Item>
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ViewHolder>
implements android.widget.Filterable, android.view.View.OnClickListener
    RecyclerView 通用的Adapter Created by fangs on 2017/7/31.
